title: Enhancing Customer Service Practical Competencies: Collaborative Creativity Development in Technology-Enhanced Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Tool Proficiency and General Understanding of Instructional Design
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can develop actual educational scenarios by applying three technology-based creative instructional design models.
Through collaborative practice, learners can establish a peer feedback system and propose optimized solutions for each project.
Learners can design learning outcome measurement indicators by combining digital tools with a creativity assessment framework.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
